text.div:
BC BreastCancerMStageCS CodeSystem

Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BreastCancerMStageCS
title: BC BreastCancerMStageCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.definition: No detectable metastatis by clinical or radiogical examination.
concept.display: No detectable metastatis by clinical or radiogical examination.

concept.definition: Cancer has spread to distant organs (most often to the bones, lungs, brain, or liver).
concept.display: Cancer has spread to distant organs (most often to the bones, lungs, brain, or liver).
